author: Nanjala Nyabola
title: The police should be the last line of defence against COVID-19
description: Violently imposed lockdowns will not be effective and will do more damage than good.
content:
April 10 marked two weeks since Kenya's COVID-19 curfew began, and so far the police have already killed more people than the illness.
The youngest victim, a 13-year-old boy, was shot dead while watching the police enforce the curfew from the balcony of his … [+5184 chars]
